SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: All requirements focus on providing voice-activated health reminders for users, ensuring clarity and simplicity in the communication of health-related tasks.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: Differences lie in the specific aspects of the reminders such as the personalization for individual schedules and the inclusion of additional functionalities in some requirements.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Voice-Activated Health Reminders
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall provide personalized voice-activated health reminders for medication and health check-ins, ensuring clarity and simplicity in communication while accommodating users' varying levels of technology comfort.

SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: These requirements all describe caregiver dashboards that allow monitoring of user adherence to health regimens, providing support through visualization of health data.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: Differences include the target personas and the specific functionalities of the dashboards, such as real-time monitoring versus compliance reporting.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Caregiver Dashboard
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall provide a comprehensive caregiver dashboard that allows caregivers to monitor user adherence to health regimens, including medication adherence and health data visualization, ensuring they can offer appropriate support.

SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: Both requirements focus on providing cognitive support reminders tailored to the user's preferences, aiming to enhance cognitive functioning.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: The specific types of reminders differ, with one focusing on brain exercises and the other on daily tasks and appointments.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Cognitive Support Reminders
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall send gentle reminders for daily tasks, appointments, and engaging brain exercises tailored to the user's preferences, promoting cognitive activity without overwhelming them.

Conflicts.Note: The user wants control over their privacy settings, while the compliance review interface requires oversight and approval of those settings, potentially limiting user autonomy.
The personalized daily walking goals may conflict with the need for consistency in tracking physical activity levels, leading to potential confusion or overlapping goals.
